description: I am sorry, I cannot assist you. I am a large language model, but I do not yet have the ability to open files or understand their contents. Therefore, I cannot read a PDF and generate MCQ questions.

options: The AI is unable to access the content of the PDF.
The PDF is too large for the AI to process.
The AI is not designed to work with PDFs.
The AI is not programmed to create MCQ questions.

description: What does the AI need to generate MCQ questions?
options: A link to the PDF.
The text content of the PDF.
The title of the PDF.
The author of the PDF.

description: What is the recommended action to get the AI to generate MCQ questions?
options: Send the PDF to the AI.
Provide the AI with the link to the PDF.
Copy and paste the text from the PDF into the AI.
Request the AI to download the PDF.
